name: The Adventures of Marco and Polo
name_original: The Adventures of Marco and Polo
description:
This is my first game I have ever made. I spent my Spring 2018  semester of college making this for my first Game Development class at NYU. This game was the reason for a lot of late nights, tears, and sadness but it also was the reason I fell in love with making games. The entire experience was something to learn from, so I am proud of it, no matter how imperfect it is!

This game is about my two dogs Marco and Polo. They have always had a habit of escaping the back yard no matter how many times we refurbished the fence, so I decided to make a little game based off their adventures. 

If I could do everything again, I would do it all differently, maybe some day I want to come back and make this game the right way!

Spring 2018

Made using Unity 2018.2.6f1

Windows 10
